document.masterDocTitle: Sphaerillo boninensis Nunomura, 1990 (Crustacea, Isopoda, Oniscidea) is a junior synonym of a pantropical species, Venezillo parvus (Budde-Lund, 1885)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Sphaerillo boninensis Nunomura, 1990 (Crustacea, Isopoda, Oniscidea) is a junior synonym of a pantropical species, Venezillo parvus (Budde-Lund, 1885)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Department of Life and Environmental Agricultural Sciences, Faculty of Agriculture, Tottori University, 4 - 101 Koyama-machi Minami, Tottori 680 - 8553, Japan

subSubSection.paragraph: Sphaerillo (?) parvus : Ferrara and Taiti 1981 : 196; Ferrara and Taiti 1983 : 70-71, figs 131-136; Taiti and Ferrara 1983 : 220-222.
Sphaerillo boninensis Nunomura, 1990: 19-21, fig. 146. Syn. nov.
Venezillo boninensis : Nunomura 1999a : 89; Nunomura 1999b : 598, 614, 624; Saito et al. 2000 : 94. Syn. nov.
Spherillo boninensis : Nunomura 2011 : 71; Nunomura 2015 : 1032, 1050, 1063; Shinobe et al. 2017 : 3. Syn. nov.

Sphaerillo boninensis
: Holotype, TOYA-Cr-8953, male, dissected, forest of
Casuaria equisetifolia
, Suzaki, Chichijima Island, Tokyo Metropolis, Japan, 1 July 1977, Jun-Ichi Aoki leg; paratype, TOYA-Cr-8955, male, dissected, forest of
Casuaria equisetifolia
, Suzaki, Chichijima Island, Tokyo Metropolis, Japan, 1 July 1977, Jun-Ichi Aoki leg; paratype, TOYA-Cr-8961, female, dissected, forest of
Casuaria equisetifolia
, Suzaki, Chichijima Island, Tokyo Metropolis, Japan, 1 July 1977, Jun-Ichi Aoki leg.
